MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsArray As Boolean
public: property bool IsArray { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出屬性是否為陣列。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the property is an array.

value.span: 傳回 值，指出屬性是否為陣列。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the property is an array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 屬性值Property Value `true` 如果屬性是物件陣列。否則， `false`。`true` if the property is an array; otherwise, `false`. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsLocal As Boolean
public: property bool IsLocal { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出屬性是否已經定義在目前的 WMI 類別中。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the property has been defined in the current WMI class.

value.span: 傳回 值，指出屬性是否已經定義在目前的 WMI 類別中。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the property has been defined in the current WMI class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 屬性值Property Value `true` 如果已定義在目前的 WMI 類別; 中的屬性否則， `false`。`true` if the property has been defined in the current WMI class; otherwise, `false`. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

summary.span: 在採用屬性的階層架構中，取得 WMI 類別的名稱。

span.span: Gets the name of the WMI class in the hierarchy in which the property was introduced.

span.span: Returns a value containing the name of the WMI class in the hierarchy in which the property was introduced.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 屬性值Property Value 字串，包含原始的 WMI 類別的名稱。A string containing the name of the originating WMI class. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
